subject: Bicycles and Bicycling
lead_paragraph: Rui Costa of Portugal, riding for the Movistar team, won the Tour of Switzerland after the 133-mile ninth and final stage, which was won by the Estonian Tanel Kangert of the Astana team.
snippet: Rui Costa of Portugal, riding for the Movistar team, won the Tour of Switzerland after the 133-mile ninth and final stage, which was won by the Estonian Tanel Kangert of the Astana team.
